ops_per_clock_notes.fp32: 12 CUs x 2 shader arrays x 32 ALUs x 2 ops (FMA) = 1,536 FP32 ops/clock
ops_per_clock_notes.fp16: 12 CUs x 128 FP32 ops/clock x 2 (packed math) = 3,072 FP16 ops/clock
ops_per_clock_notes.int8: 12 CUs x 128 x 4 (WMMA) = 6,144 INT8 ops/clock (AI acceleration)
ops_per_clock_notes.note: RDNA 3 architecture with AI accelerators. Integrated in Ryzen 7040/8040 series APUs.

theoretical_peaks_notes: Calculated at boost_clock_mhz (2900 MHz). Actual clocks vary by APU SKU and thermal conditions.
notes: AMD Radeon 780M integrated GPU in Ryzen 7040/8040 series APUs. RDNA 3 architecture with 12 CUs (768 stream processors). Shares LPDDR5/DDR5 memory with CPU. Supports hardware ray tracing. AI acceleration via WMMA instructions. Peak bandwidth assumes dual-channel LPDDR5-5600.
